title: Samsung SmartThings Motion Sensor F-CEN-IRM-1 - Overview
description:
Samsung SmartThings Motion Sensor - F-CEN-IRM-1
http://www.abt.com/product/98959/Samsung-FCENIRM1.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=FCENIRM1_20160321

More Samsung SmartThings Videos:

Samsung SmartThings Multipurpose Sensor: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zXyXvCwoCck

Samsung SmartThings Kit:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Ww6RFFlTOE

Samsung SmartThings Hub: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tOqCSUIsBrg

Samsung SmartThings Power Outlet: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pBCzHwsKsvA


The Samsung SmartThings Motion Sensor sends you notifications when movement occurs in a certain area of your home. It can also trigger different actions to occur once movement starts and stops.
Key Features:
• Get Notifications When Movement is Detected and Trigger Actions in Response
• Trigger Lights To Turn On When You Enter Or Off When Theres No Motion
• Receive An Immediate Alert If Motion Is Detected While Youre Away Or Asleep
• Set Your Heating and Cooling to Adjust Based on Temperature or Motion
Features:
• Detect Motion
Receive an immediate alert on your smart phone if unexpected motion is detected while youre away or asleep.
• Automate Lights Upon Entry & Exit
Trigger responses to motion such as lights to automatically turn on when you enter a room or turn off when theres no motion for a specified length of time.
• Trigger Your Thermostat to Motion
Have your heating & cooling adjust based on temperature or as people come & go.
